page.title: 12A FISHERMAN OF WEST WIGHT
page.content:
A fisherman has patience.My dad sometimes waits for 2 hours without getting a fish.Fishermen go out at the Needles most of their spare time.For bait fishermen use worms,squid,spoon, and feathers.Fishermen catch cod, dogfish, mackerel, congers, bass, and flatfish. My dad is a normal fisherman he fishes with a rod not a net. Most fishermen go in trawler boats. Sometimes you see sharks but you don't catch them. When I go fishing I go down the River Yar. I catch flatfish, bass, wrasse too. My dad's friend Terry also has fishing as a hobby and he has just built a big boat to go out to St. Catherine's point.He catches big congers.
Brett Deebank 8 years
